Driver.ShellyAsASwitch: - Added support for External Sensor Hat for the Shelly1 and 1PM
Driver.ShellyHTMQTT:
- Added code to pull settings and status when the device wakes up.
- RSSI value is definded as exelent, good or poor. The actual rssi reading is under state variables.
Driver.ShellyDimmer: - Added code that will allow you to upgrade the device firmware.
Driver.ShellyAlarm: - Added code that will allow you to upgrade the device firmware.
